trans-unit.source:
אנו מכירים תודה לעשרות המתנדבים
אשר תרמו ממרצם וזמנם לפיתוח האתר.
ובנוסף לתמיכתם האדיבה של
trans-unit.target: We are grateful to the dozens of volunteers who have contributed their energy and time to developing the site. And in addition, to the generous support of

trans-unit.source: This website was created and maintained with the financial support of the European Union. Its contents are the sole responsibility of the Public Knowledge Workshop and do not necessarily reflect the views of the European Union.
